name: 特洛伊·布朗森
name_full: 特洛伊·布朗森 Troy Bronson
introduction: Troy Bronson is an American model and actor, born October 10 in Seattle, Washington, USA. Known for '+380 Ukraine' (2022) and 'Oppenheimer' (2023). His first role was in a popular 1-billion views music video. He studies at the University of California, Berkeley, and has traveled to 47 countries documenting the lives of extraordinary people.
